channel.title: Carpal Tunnel Syndrome
channel.description:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carpal_tunnel_syndrome
While Carpal Tunnel Syndrome (CTS) has many causes, ceramicists are constantly using their hands and prone to CTS caused by repetitive wrist work- pactices like kneading clay and throwing.

item.title: Carpal Tunnel Syndrome
item.dc:creator: ceramicswiki
item.description:
en.wikipedia.org

Carpal tunnel syndrome

Carpal tunnel syndrome (CTS) is a medical condition due to compression of the median nerve as it travels through the wrist at the carpal tunnel. The main symptoms are pain, numbness and tingling in the thumb, index finger, middle finger and the thumb side of the ring finger. Symptoms typically start gradually and during the night. Pain may extend up the arm. Weak grip strength may occur, and after a long period of time the muscles at the base of the thumb may waste away. In more th Risk factors i...

While Carpal Tunnel Syndrome (CTS) has many causes, ceramicists are constantly using their hands and prone to CTS caused by repetitive wrist work- pactices like kneading clay and throwing.
